name: Mecha Girls - by EDG
description:
If you'd like to support me and do more:
https://ko-fi.com/edgonkofi - commissions open!
If you're looking for a >>LoRA Making Tutorial<<

Mecha Girls - by EDG

With this model you will be able to generate splendid mecha girls!

This LoRA gives you a lot of creative freedom.

meta.prompt:
4K, Masterpiece, highres, absurdres,natural volumetric lighting and best shadows, deep depth of field, sharp focus, soft delicate beautiful attractive face,vandread,blonde ((Nadia with sunglasses and a choker)) , vandread drawing style, <lora:Dita:0.25> <lora:Nadia:0.35> <lora:zeronis:0.25>
(edgMechagirl, a woman in a mecha outfit,futuristic armor,wearing edgMechaGirl cyber_armor :1.2),cowboy shot<lora:edgMechagirl:0.7>
meta.negativePrompt: (worst quality:1.50), (low quality:1.50), bad anatomy, watermark, signature, low-res, Blurry, low quality, poorly lit, unrealistic proportions, bad composition, poor color choices, incorrect lighting, noisy, pixelated, cartoonish, poorly textured, distorted features, bad facial expression, absurdly long hair, floating hair, (((holding polearm, polearm, holding shield, shield:1.4))),
